text: (napiye!) Evarkal ivvulaka valkkaiyal mayakkappattu, tankal markkattai vilaiyattakavum vetikkaiyakavum etuttuk kontarkalo avarkalai (avarkal pokkil) vittuvituviraka. Eninum, ovvor atmavum tan (tiya) ceyalkalin karanamaka (marumai nalil) apattirkullakum enra unmaiyai nir (avarkalukku) napakappatuttuviraka. (Annalil) atarkup parintu pecupavarkalo, utavi ceypavarkalo allahvaiyanri oruvarum irukkamattar. (Cattiyamana) anaittaiyum (pavikal tankal vetanaikkup) piratiyakak kotuttapotilum atu ankikarikkappata mattatu. Ivarkal tankal (tiya) ceyalkalin karanamakave apattirkullanarkal. Ivarkalin nirakarippin karanamaka mikka tunpuruttum vetanaiyutan (kutippatarku) kotikkum paname ivarkalukkuk kitaikkum
